summary: Modern, premium, mobile-first website for ‚ÄúTaste & Tales ‚Äì Multicuisine Restaurant‚Äù (Raysan, near GIFT City, Gandhinagar) with clean elegant design, warm food color palette, high-quality imagery, core pages (Home, About, Menu with PDF download, Offers, Gallery, Contact/Location), and integrations for ordering, table booking, WhatsApp, calling, and SEO/performance optimization.
architectural_notes: Design style: clean, modern, elegant with warm food colors (dark green, deep red, beige, soft gold accents) and professional typography.
Mobile-first responsive implementation required across all pages.
SEO target keyword phrase: ‚ÄúRestaurant near GIFT City Gandhinagar‚Äù.
Include WhatsApp click-to-chat and prominent Call Now entry points.
Performance requirement: fast-loading pages and optimized media.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium restaurant hero banner photo with elegant plating and warm moody lighting (taste-tales-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimal premium logo mark with dark green/deep red/beige/soft gold palette (taste-tales-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Favicon icon derived from the logo mark, simple and high-contrast (taste-tales-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
- High-quality food photo: North Indian thali with warm lighting (gallery-north-indian.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality food photo: Chinese noodles/dumplings with vibrant colors (gallery-chinese.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality food photo: Mexican tacos/platter with rustic styling (gallery-mexican.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality food photo: Thai curry with herbs and steam (gallery-thai.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality food photo: Italian pasta/pizza with premium plating (gallery-italian.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality food photo: Fast food burger/fries with premium styling (gallery-fast-food.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality dessert photo: plated dessert with soft gold highlights (gallery-desserts.dim_1200x800.png)
- High-quality shakes photo: tall milkshakes with creamy texture and garnish (gallery-shakes.dim_1200x800.png)
- Interior ambience photo: warm family-friendly seating, premium decor (gallery-ambience.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a complete mobile-first marketing website for ‚ÄúTaste & Tales ‚Äì Multicuisine Restaurant‚Äù (Raysan, Near GIFT City, Gandhinagar) with the following top-level pages and navigation: Home, About Us, Menu, Offers & Deals, Gallery, Contact & Location. Include a sticky header with clear navigation and prominent CTAs.

Implement the Home page hero section with: tagline ‚ÄúA World of Flavours Under One Roof‚Äù, two CTA buttons (Order Online, Book a Table), and a highlights strip/cards containing: ‚Äú‚≠ê 4.2 Dining Rating‚Äù, ‚Äúüë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß Family Friendly‚Äù, ‚Äúüïö Open 11 AM ‚Äì 11 PM‚Äù, ‚Äúüí≥ Digital Payments Accepted‚Äù.

Create the About Us page with a concise brand story emphasizing passion for global cuisines, quality ingredients, and hygiene, aligned to the positioning: family-friendly, premium yet affordable, popular for dining + delivery, and serving multiple cuisines (North Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Thai, Italian, Fast Food, Desserts & Shakes).

Create the Menu page with clearly separated cuisine categories: North Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Thai, Italian, Fast Food, Desserts, Shakes. Include a prominent ‚ÄúDownload Menu (PDF)‚Äù button that downloads a static PDF file shipped with the frontend.
Create the Offers & Deals page listing the following offers with clear visual hierarchy: ‚ÄúFlat 15% Pre-book offer‚Äù, ‚ÄúInstant 10% off on bill payments‚Äù, and ‚ÄúBank & RuPay offers‚Äù.
Create the Gallery page showcasing high-quality imagery for food, ambience, and family seating using a responsive grid/lightbox-style experience suitable for mobile-first browsing.

Create the Contact & Location page with: address text for Raysan, Near GIFT City, Gandhinagar; a Google Map embed (iframe); phone number +91 75676 78009 with a prominent ‚ÄúCall Now‚Äù button (tel link); and a WhatsApp click-to-chat button linking to the restaurant‚Äôs WhatsApp number.

Add a site-wide footer containing: opening hours (11 AM ‚Äì 11 PM), social media icons (placeholders are acceptable if URLs are not provided), and ‚ÄúOrder via Zomato / Swiggy‚Äù buttons (use configurable placeholder URLs if actual links are not provided).

Apply a consistent, clean, modern, elegant visual theme across the site using warm food colors (dark green, deep red, beige, soft gold accents) and professional typography, with a premium yet family-friendly feel and a strong focus on large, high-quality imagery.

Implement performance and SEO basics suitable for a restaurant marketing site: optimized images (proper sizing/compression), sensible page titles/meta descriptions, Open Graph metadata, and on-page SEO targeting the phrase ‚ÄúRestaurant near GIFT City Gandhinagar‚Äù.
